reviews.text:
Great hotel with very clean rooms and bathroom, although shower is too tight.
Delicious and varied breakfast.
The staff was always helpful, attentive and kind. Especially Valentina at the dining room and terrace, but also the rest of the waiters and the girls at the reception desk.
Good location, not far from the city centre.
Last but not least, superb swimming pool where you can chill out under Rome's beautiful sun.
Pedro (Basque Country)

We loved this hotel! From the first time we stepped through the door,  to the moment we checked out,  we had excellent service ! The staff were knowledgeable, kind and very helpful! The location was great and the hotel offered many amenities including a beautiful pool! The complimentary  breakfast in the morning was wonderful and the food by the poolside was great as well.
We would like to recognize a few individuals that assisted us and that really helped make our stay that much better: Thank you to Beatrice , Sergio, G and Diario, you all were amazing and we truly appreciate all of your help!

We were a famely of 13, aging from 16 to 85 and I think we all agread that the hotel was beautiful, spacious rooms with good beds and very friendly and helpful staff. The breakfast buffey was really good, something for everyone, and we had a birthday dinner there as well and it was soooo good! I would love to stay there again.

3 night stay in Roma at this Grand Hotel del Gianicolo was a magnificent experience! The front desk staff was so friendly and nice and very helpful with whatever questions we had to ask, the rooms we're very nice good space, comfortable beds, clean and well kept maintained. The amenities are great there, complimentary breakfast, bell hop service to help with your luggage, and youâ€™ll LOVE the pool. Beatrice, Sergio, and G made our visit there the most memorable time they were the best!

This was a Bristol hotel for the Air conditioning and the pool atop the hill in Giancolo. Some staff were really helpful and others had a template for tourists but wear all recommended was good and knowledgeable.
